abilities.name: Apply-Conditions-Short
abilities.action: /w gm  Conditions: [Blinded](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Blinded)[Charmed](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Charmed)[Concentration](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Concentrating)[Deafened](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Deafened)[Exhausted](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Exhausted)[Encumbered](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Slow)[Frightened](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Frightened)[Grappled](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Grappled)[Heavily Encumbered](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Fast)[Hungover](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Hungover2)[Incapacitated](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Incapacitated)[Invisible](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Invisible)[Paralyzed](!token-mod {{ --set statusmarkers|Incapacitated statusmarkers|Paralyzed }})[Petrified](!token-mod {{ --set statusmarkers|Incapacitated statusmarkers||Petrified }})[Poisoned](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Poisoned)[Prone](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Prone)[Silenced](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Silenced)[Sleeping](!token-mod {{ --set statusmarkers|Incapacitated statusmarkers|Sleeping }})[Stealth](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Hidden)[Stunned](!token-mod {{ --set statusmarkers|Incapacitated statusmarkers|Stunned }})[Suffocating](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Suffocating)[Unconscious](!token-mod {{ --set statusmarkers|Incapacitated statusmarkers|Unconscious }})[Remove All CM](!cmaster --clear) [Remove All TokenMod](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|=dead|-dead)

abilities.name: Apply-Spells-Short
abilities.action: /w gm  Spells: [Bane](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Bane)[Bardic Inspiration](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|BardicInspiration)[Blessed](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Blessed)[Blur](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Blur)[Haste](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Haste)[Hexblade Curse](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Hexed)[Hex](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Hexed3)[Hunter Marked](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|HunterMark)[Mage Armor](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|MageArmor)[Mirror Images](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|MirrorImages)[Protection Good/Evil](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Protection)[Raging](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Raging)[Slowed](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Snail)

abilities.name: Apply-Status-Short
abilities.action: /w gm Status: [Advantage](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Advantage)[Climbing](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Climbing)[Full Cover](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Cover)[1/2 Cover](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|HalfCover)[3/4 Cover](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|ThreeQuarterCover)[Death](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Death)[Death 1](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Death1)[Death 2](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Death2)[Death 3](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Death3)[Disadvantage](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Disadvantage)[Diseased](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Diseased)[Dodging](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Dodging)[Ethereal](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Ethereal)[Flying](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Flying)[Hex-Alt](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Hexed2)[Inebriated 1](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Inebriated)[Inebriated 2](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Inebriated2)[Inebriated 3](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Shroom)[Readied Action](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|Readied)[Weapon Poisoned](!token-mod --set statusmarkers|WeaponPoison)

abilities.name: Heal-Target
abilities.action:
!token-mod --set bar1_value|+[[?{Type|Common (2d4+2),[[2d4+2]]|Greater (4d4+4),[[4d4+4]]|Superior (8d4+4),[[8d4+4]]|Supreme (10d4+20),[[10d4+20]]|Other,?{Custom Heal}}]]  --ids @{target|Token to Heal|token_id}
/em healed @{target|Token to Heal|token_name}.

abilities.name: PC-Info
abilities.action: /w gm &{template:default} {{name=@{selected|character_name}}} {{HP=[[@{selected|bar1}]] / [[@{selected|bar1|max}]]}} {{AC=@{selected|AC}}} {{Speed=@{selected|speed}}} {{Height/Weight=@{selected|height}/@{selected|weight}}} {{Alignment=@{selected|alignment}}} {{Passive Perception (WIS)=@{selected|passive_wisdom}}} {{Passive Investigation (INT)=[[10+@{selected|investigation_bonus}]]}} {{Spell Attack Mod=+@{selected|spell_attack_bonus}}} {{Spell DC=+@{selected|spell_save_dc}}} {{Encumbered*=[[@{selected|strength}*5}]] lbs}} {{Heavily Encumbered*=[[@{selected|strength}*10}]] lbs}} {{Standing Long Jump=[[@{selected|strength}/2]]}} {{Running Long Jump (10ft)=[[@{selected|strength}]]}} {{Standing High Jump=[[(@{selected|strength_mod}+3)/2]]}} {{Running High Jump (10ft)=[[@{selected|strength_mod}+3]]}} {{Hold Breath=[[@{selected|constitution_mod}+1]] mins}}{{Rounds without Breath=[[@{selected|constitution_mod}]]}}{{Without Food=[[@{selected|constitution_mod}+3]] days}} {{* Powerful Builds are doubled}}

abilities.name: Saving-Throw
